title: Sheilded from Demotion
body: Hi,  i am currently Gold V with 0 LP in solo queue and and have been losing some games. Now it says im shielded from demotion and that winning more games will prevent me from being demoted. If i stop playing solo queue at Gold V 0 LP with this shield will i still get the ranked season rewards such as the skin and gold border???  Thanks

replies.body: As long as you don't dip below Gold due to losing and being demoted or from decay, you should be getting those Gold rewards! Also keep in mind the [**ranked rewards eligibilities**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068) as well!
Decay doesn't occur in gold right?? So I can stop playing now and still get the rewards since gold doesn't decay???
You are correct. Gold does not decay anymore. You should be safe to sit on that Gold 5 ranking and enjoy those rewards.
